system.description:
Watercraft: controlling and using watercraft, including submarines. This skill includes navigating these vehicles, as well as performing basic maintenance, but not repairs.

Examples: throw Watercraft/DEX 6+ to pilot a small motorboat through a storm without sinking. Throw Watercraft/DEX 12+ to sail a boat through a series of reefs and emerge unscathed, during a storm. Throw Watercraft/EDU 10+ to plot the circumnavigation of a planet.
system.shortdescr: Controlling and using watercraft, including submarines
